title: A 5-Minute Guide to HTTP Response Codes
summary: If you've done any network scanning or application testing, you've run into your fair share of HTTP response codes.

title: Simple macOS kernel extension fuzzing in userspace with IDA and TinyInst
summary:
Posted by Ivan Fratric, Google Project Zero

title: Key Transparency and the Right to be Forgotten
summary: This post is the first in a new series covering some of the reasoning behind decisions made in my project to build end-to-end encryption for direct messages on the Fediverse.
